title: Sixtyfive Roses: A Sister's Memoir
description: A loving, funny and profoundly moving literary memoir. The redemptive story of two sisters growing up in the shadow of a fatal illness, and a family fighting for a child's life.Best 100 Books of 2006, Globe and Mail (Canada)Target Stores Recommended Read 2008Canada Reads Memoir Top 40 2010
author: Heather Summerhayes Cariou
